00020 #ifndef CSSBUILDER_H
00021 #define CSSBUILDER_H
00022 
00023 #include <string>
00024 #include <map>
00025 #include <sstream>
00026 
00027 using std::string;
00028 using std::map;
00029 using std::stringstream;
00030 
00034 class CSSBuilder{
00035         private:
00036                 typedef map<string, string> RuleSet;
00037                 typedef map<string, RuleSet> CSSStruct;
00038                 RuleSet ruleSetHolder;
00039                 CSSStruct cssStruct;
00040                 mutable stringstream& css;
00041                 mutable bool commited;
00042         public:
00043     CSSBuilder(stringstream& cssStream);
00044     ~CSSBuilder();
00045     void commit() const;
00046     bool isCommited() const;
00047         public:
00048     CSSBuilder& makeSelector(const string& selectorName);
00049     CSSBuilder& copyFromSelector(const string& selectorName);
00050     CSSBuilder& addToSelector(const string& selectorName);
00051                 CSSBuilder& getSelector(const string& selectorName);
00052                 bool selectorExists(const string& selectorName) const;
00053                 CSSBuilder& removeSelector(const string& selectorName);
00054         public:
00055     CSSBuilder& addRule(const string& key, const string& val);
00056     string getRule(const string& key) const;
00057     bool ruleExists(const string& key) const;
00058     CSSBuilder& removeRule(const string& key);
00059         public:
00060                 void end();
00061                 void operator++(int);
00062 };
